src:
CBD Is More Popular Than Jesus, Kanye West, The NBA, Taylor Swift, The Beatles And AOC Right Now, Data Shows
01 Nov 2019 by Javier Hasse


Cannabis And Frida KahloJavier Hasse - https://www.instagram.com/javierhasse/

CBD might as well stand for “crazy buzz, Dude.” The chemical compound found in cannabis and hemp is everywhere these days, from products for athletes to beverages, and from hummus to the investment portfolio of the Church of England.While some of these infusions are more warranted than others, one thing seems clear: people are very interested in CBD and its massive medical properties, ranging from pain relief, to treating the symptoms of epilepsy, to reducing anxiety, to helping with acne.
But how popular is CBD really? Is it just a thing of the media? Does CBD showing up at gas stations and shoe stores mean people are really that in it? Or is there some overbuilt hype?
To find out, I asked cannabisMD to share some stats out of its Knowledge Navigator, just to come up with a fun weekend read.
The Buzz Is Real!
According to cannabisMD’s data, CBD is among the most popular things on the Internet, only outranked by a few keywords like PornHub and Halloween right now.
Meanwhile, dozens of other very popular topics are lagging behind the buzzing chemical compound found in cannabis and hemp.



Let’s take a look at the findings. But before, a quick look at how the company arrived at these conclusions:
cannabisMD, a non-advocacy educational platform, used its Knowledge Navigator, a backend tool used to survey consumer trends, to gauge the interest in CBD and THC on the Internet. Using data pulled from user searches across the web, including over 12,000 URLs, along with social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram and Twitter, the company arrived at the following conclusions (charted on a 2-year time period, pitting CBD against each subjec below).

CBD vs Pornhub



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs PornhubCannabisMD


CBD vs. Joker



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs JokerCannabisMD


CBD vs. Impossible Burger



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs Impossible BurgerCannabisMD


CBD vs Playboy



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs PlayboyCannabisMD


CBD vs South Park



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs South ParkCannabisMD





CBD vs Kanye West



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs Kayne WestCannabisMD


CBD vs Taylor Swift



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs Taylor SwiftCannabisMD


CBD vs THC



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs TetrahydrocannabinolCannabisMD


CBD vs Keto Diet



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs Keto DietCannabisMD


CBD vs Jesus



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs JesusCannabisMD


CBD vs Aspirin



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs AspirinCannabisMD


CBD vs Taiwan Protests



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs Taiwan ProtestsCannabisMD


CBD vs Adventure Time



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs Adventure TimeCannabisMD


CBD vs That NBC Peacock 



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs NBCCannabisMD


CBD vs Modern Family



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs Modern FamilyCannabisMD


CBD vs HBO Max



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs HBO MaxCannabisMD


CBD vs NBA



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs NBACannabisMD


CBD vs World Series Baseball



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs World SeriesCannabisMD


CBD vs Halloween



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs HalloweenCannabisMD





CBD vs Monday Night Football



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs Monday Night FootballCannabisMD


CBD vs Sexy Halloween Costumes



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs Sexy Halloween CostumesCannabisMD


CBD vs 5g



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs 5GCannabisMD


CBD vc AOC



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs AOCCannabisMD


CBD vs Voting



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs VoteCannabisMD


CBD vs Pixel 4



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs Pixel 4CannabisMD


CBD vs The Beatles



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs The BeatlesCannabisMD


CBD vs. Lil Nas X



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs Lil Nas XCannabisMD


CBD vs. Will Smith



Relative Search Volume in US CBD vs Will SmithCannabisMD

Surprised with these results?
